properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Switch Horizontal For Vertical
properties.desc: The Switch Horizontal For Vertical toggle handles images which has been produced using a different scanning order.

properties.name: Flip Horizontal
properties.desc: The Flip Horizontal toggle will reverse the order of each pixel in the incoming image in the horizontal direction.

properties.name: Flip Vertical
properties.desc: The Flip Vertical toggle will reverse the order of each pixel in the incoming image in the vertical direction.

properties.name: Horizontal Scale Factor
properties.desc: The Horizontal Scale Factor slider sets a factor for enlarging or shrinking the image. It represents an East/West scaling.

properties.name: Vertical Scale Factor
properties.desc: The Vertical Scale Factor slider sets a factor for enlarging or shrinking the image. It represents a North/South scaling.

properties.name: Angular Shift
properties.desc: The Angular Shift slider controls the rotation (in degrees) of the texture around the cylinder.

properties.name: Vertical Shift
properties.desc: The Vertical Shift slider controls the vertical position of the texture on the cylinder.

properties.name: Cylinder Center
properties.desc: The Cylinder Center is value of the center of the cylinder to use in the texture mapping process.

properties.name: Cylinder Z Min
properties.desc: The Cylinder Z Min is the value of the minimum of the cylinder vertical extent to use in the texture mapping process.

properties.name: Cylinder Z Max
properties.desc: The Cylinder Z Max is the value of the maximum of the cylinder vertical extent to use in the texture mapping process.
